description: cup, cermaic-porcelain, cup and saucer from a dejeuner, painted with portraits of Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette; the crossed L's in the foliage refer to Louis, and much of the iconography (rings, birds, etc.) refer to a marriage or betrothal
markings: Monogram in blue on underside of cup:\'HM\' or \'MHJ\'
medium: Porcelain with enamel and gilded decoration
text: The identity of the portraits on this cup and saucer are not known; they may depict King Louis XVI and Marie Antoinette of France on the occasion of their marriage in 1770.
title: Cup
